Name: Victor Olvera
Description:
Victor was shot multiple times with a shotgun after being hunted down by Isaac Fountain after he found out that his lover was "a man".

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10_JeZ7LEIRhvewTCoL5mVkH6MQJzf7fSXl4-P6QJ0v0/edit#gid=0

Name: Monique Thomas
Description:
Monique's body was not discovered for a week after she was murdered.

Subsequently George Stallings was caught using Thomas’s car and credit cars. He blamed the murder on “some men” who, he said, had discovered that Thomas was "biologically male".

Stallings was convicted of murder and is serving a life sentence.

https://web.archive.org/web/20160519195753/http://www.masstpc.org/community-events/tdor/ma-trans-victims/

Name: Chanel Chandler
Description:
Chanel was stabbed to death, allegedly by Christopher Joseph Lopez and a 16-year-old friend.
